markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Strategic Bypass](/Feats.aspx?ID=5969) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 112 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your plans account for your foes' resistances, enabling you to strike a telling blow. When you hit with a Strike on which you substituted your attack roll due to [Devising a Stratagem](/Actions.aspx?ID=2813), you ignore an amount of resistance equal to your Intelligence modifier for each resistance that applies against your attack.
name: Strategic Bypass
